greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T, read by rows, equal to the matrix 4th power of triangle A113095, which satisfies the recurrence: A113095(n,k) = [A113095^4](n-1,k-1) + [A113095^4](n-1,k).
comment: Column 0 equals A113096 shift left one place.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 14 2005
